What a find!  Please seed this guys, I am so happy to be getting this much sweet MMA action.

People can complain all they want, about quality issues and the fact that this is missing a couple GP events - but in the end, this is the most complete PRIDE collection you can get in one single torrent.  Even obtaining a complete DVD collection is a bit of a challenge to get these days.  And if you don't want to buy them, then don't bitch.  Someone went through A HELL of alot of trouble to give these monumental and memorable events to MMA fans who can't afford to but the whole set.  It seems like just yesterday that I was watching these events and a torrent like this that's still alive after over 4 years - words cannot express my gratitude to the OP and everyone who's kept this torrent alive.  Sometimes I shed a tear thinking back on the good ol' days of extreme big time MMA and I consider myself lucky to have found such a torrent.  In conclusion, fuck all you people complaining.  You want to see the rest, than save up your earnings for some time and buy the rest.  Be glad you don't have to scour the internet, PAYING FOR a complete set.  Geez, sometimes the human race really lets me down.
